snippet: A semigovernmental Israeli organization said Thursday that it had flown the Jews to Israel, secretly helping them to escape political unrest and threats in Yemen.
abstract: Jewish Agency for Israeli says it has flown 17 Yemeni Jews to Israel, secretly helping them to escape political unrest and threats to their safety in Yemen.
lead_paragraph: A semigovernmental Israeli organization said Thursday that it had flown the Jews to Israel, secretly helping them to escape political unrest and threats in Yemen.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
